articles.description: New research suggests a lost advanced civilization was wiped out by an ancient explosion 12,800 years ago, with evidence found in Louisiana.
articles.content:
A cosmic blast may have wiped out a lost civilization 12,800 years ago. Credit: Kevin Gill / CC BY 2.0
A powerful cosmic explosion may have wiped out an early, advanced human civilization around 12,… [+3395 chars]

articles.title: A Never-Before-Seen 95-Million-Year-Old Plant-Eating Dinosaur Finally Reveals Itself - The Daily Galaxy
articles.description: A 95-million-year disappearance ends with a dinosaur no one believed existed.
articles.content: In Argentinas Patagonia, researchers have uncovered a previously unknown dinosaur species that lived approximately 95 million years ago. Named Astigmasaura genuflexa, this massive plant-eating saurop… [+3264 chars]

articles.author: Sharmila Kuthunur
articles.title: 'Space hurricane' caught raging over North Pole during one of the sun's quietest days - Live Science
articles.description: A rare "space hurricane" that swirled over Earth's North Pole in 2014 caused intense space weather effects despite unusually quiet solar conditions, a new study reports.
articles.content:
A rare hurricane that raged high above Earth's North Pole in 2014 packed a surprising punch, and may be even stranger than scientists first thought.
